translation.en: [male voice] Don't let 'em see you cry, Haley.
translation.es: No dejes que te vean llorar, Haley.

translation.en: [male voice] You will get them next time.

translation.es: La predadora alfa. Sí, eso eres.
Hola, ¿qué tal? ¿Estás bien? Te llamé toda la mañana.

translation.en: -I've been calling you all morning. -Sorry. Late night, early practice.
translation.es: ¿Estás bien? Te llamé toda la mañana. Perdón. Anoche salí y vine a entrenar temprano.

translation.en: You're having practice during a hurricane?
[female news broadcaster] More than one million people are now facing mandatory evacuation orders.
translation.es: Más de un millón de personas recibieron órdenes de evacuación.

translation.en: They said it was gonna miss us.
[woman on phone] Don't you get alerts on your phone? It's gonna hit really hard.
translation.es: ¿No te avisan en el teléfono? Golpeará muy fuerte.

translation.en: -Louie, honey. -Hey, bubba. Look at you. Hi. Hi.
Anyway, Haley, listen. Have you heard from Dad?
[woman on phone] Oh, he's not answering my calls.
Well, he probably had a late night, too. [woman on phone] Yeah, I just need to know he's okay.
translation.es: - Seguramente también salió anoche. - Necesito saber si está bien.

translation.en: They've already evacuated the whole south coast.
translation.es: Ya evacuaron toda la costa sur.

translation.en: Or maybe he's doing something stupid, like trying to ride it out.
translation.es: O está haciendo una tontería, como quedarse allí.

translation.en: [woman on phone] Give her a break.
Dad should've returned my calls by now. He always does.
translation.es: Papá ya debería haber contestado. Siempre contesta.

translation.en: Look, I'll drive down and check on him.
-[woman on phone] Are you crazy? -75 South will be empty.
I can be there in, like, two hours.
I'm not having both of you down there in a Category 5.
translation.es: No quiero a los dos allí en un Categoría 5.

translation.en: Then why did you call me?
[woman on phone] Because I thought you might've heard from him.
translation.es: Por si sabías algo de él.

translation.en: -Did you fight again? -[Haley] He fights with me.
translation.es: - ¿Se pelearon otra vez? - Él pelea conmigo.

translation.en: [woman on phone] Because you're exactly alike.
Yeah, and you're more like Mom.
translation.es: Sí, y tú te pareces a mamá.

translation.en: If you hear from him, text me.
translation.es: Si te llama, mándame un texto.

translation.en: -Okay. I love you. -[Beth] Love you too.
[man 1 on radio laughing] That is ridiculous. That can't be true.
[man 2 on radio] I'm telling you, if you think that's funny, get this.
translation.es: Si eso te hace gracia, escucha esto.

translation.en: -[man 1 on radio] Go ahead. -[man 2 on radio] Pasco County
translation.es: Dime. El sheriff del condado de Pasco había advertido

translation.en: sheriff's office has warned people to not shoot guns into the hurricane.
translation.es: El sheriff del condado de Pasco había advertido no disparar hacia el huracán.

translation.en: [man 1 on radio] What? You can't shoot guns in a hurricane?
[man 1 on radio] Florida is a stand-your-ground state after all.
translation.es: Florida es un estado de "defensa propia".

translation.en: [man 2 on radio] Hell yeah, it is!
translation.es: ¡Claro que sí! Por eso estoy aquí.

translation.en: [Dave] You've reached Dave Keller, Dave Keller Construction.
translation.es: Soy Dave Keller, de Construcciones Dave Keller.

translation.en: Probably up a ladder somewhere, so please leave a message.
translation.es: Debo andar en una escalera. Deje su mensaje.

translation.en: -[cell phone beeps] -[Haley] Dad, it's Haley. Call me back.
[sighs] Oh, man. What a shit show.
I swear to God, if you've already left…
translation.es: Te juro que si ya te fuiste...

translation.en: [man] Whoa, whoa, whoa, slow down. Slow down, slow down.
Uh. Sorry, miss, we can't let--
We've had better days. The evacuation drives people nuts.
translation.es: He tenido días mejores. La evacuación enloquece a la gente.

translation.en: -This guy tried to go around. -No hurricane party this year?
translation.es: Ese intentó dar la vuelta. ¿No habrá fiesta este año?

translation.en: Hey, how's your sister? Your old man says she's, uh, living up in Boston.
translation.es: ¿Cómo está tu hermana? Tu papá dice que vive en Boston.

translation.en: She actually asked me to go check on him.
translation.es: Quiere que vaya a ver si él está bien.

translation.en: Uh, I'm afraid I can't let you do that.
The storm's turning west and heading straight for us.
translation.es: La tormenta vira al oeste y caerá aquí.

translation.en: -We're not letting anyone through. -Come on, Wayne.
Look, I know the roads. I'll be in and out, I promise.
translation.es: Conozco los caminos. Te prometo que volveré enseguida.

translation.en: Look, I'm really sorry, Haley. I wish I could help you out, but I just--
translation.es: Lo siento mucho, Haley. Ojalá pudiera ayudarte, pero...

translation.en: I can't. I wouldn't want you to get hurt.
translation.es: No puedo. No quiero que te lastimes.

translation.en: But maybe you could check on him later if you get a chance?
translation.es: ¿Podrías ir a ver cómo está más tarde?

translation.en: Uh, say hi to your sister for me.
translation.es: Saluda a tu hermana de mi parte.

translation.en: [man] All roads are closed up ahead.
[Wayne] Just wait! Stay where you are.
[man on radio] It looks like Wendy's now gonna go right through the middle of our state.
translation.es: Parece que Wendy atravesará el centro del estado.

translation.en: We strongly urge local residents to listen to all warnings from officials.
translation.es: Instamos a los residentes a escuchar las advertencias de las autoridades.

translation.en: If you're in an evacuation zone, you gotta get out. You can't wait.
translation.es: Si están en una zona de evacuación, váyanse. No esperen más.

translation.en: We... We won't be able to come for you.
translation.es: No... No podremos ir a buscarlos.

translation.en: I hope every parent in the state is thinking…
translation.es: Ojalá todos los padres del estado estén pensando:

translation.en: "How do I keep my family safe?"
translation.es: "¿Cómo mantengo a salvo a mi familia?".

translation.en: Where's Dad, hey? Where is he?
[Haley] No sign of Dad, but Sugar's here. He wouldn't have gone without her.
translation.es: No veo a papá, pero Sugar está aquí. No la habría dejado.

translation.en: It's weird. It's like a ghost town. Everyone's gone.
translation.es: Es raro, parece un pueblo fantasma. No hay nadie.

translation.en: [Beth] Please, just-- just get yourself somewhere safe,
translation.es: Por favor, ve a un lugar seguro,

translation.en: even if you have to stop at a shelter.
You think he went to the old house?
translation.es: ¿Crees que fue a la vieja casa?

translation.en: [Beth] No, I think it's been in escrow since the divorce.
translation.es: No, creo que está en fideicomiso desde el divorcio.

translation.en: Beth, there's pictures of you, me, and Mom laid out everywhere.
translation.es: Hay fotos de nosotras y de mamá por todas partes.

translation.en: This condo is horrible. It's depressing.
translation.es: Este apartamento es horrible. Es deprimente.

translation.en: [Beth] Haley, you have to stop blaming them. It was their mutual decision.
translation.es: Tienes que dejar de culparlos. Fue una decisión mutua.

translation.en: [Haley sighs] Whatever. I'm gonna check the house.
-No, don't you dare. I'm not hav-- -Hey, I bumped
translation.es: Ni se te ocurra. No te... Vi a tu exnovio Wayne de camino.

translation.en: into your ex-boyfriend Wayne on the way down.
translation.es: Vi a tu exnovio Wayne de camino.

translation.en: -He was not my boyfriend. -Whatever you say.
translation.es: Nunca fue mi novio. Si tú lo dices.

translation.en: I still remember the time Dad caught you guys.
translation.es: Aún recuerdo cuando papá los sorprendió.

translation.en: [Beth] Stop! Oh, my God. How do you remember that? You were like--
translation.es: ¡Basta! ¿Cómo te acuerdas de eso? Tenías solo...
- Ay, Dios. - Me marcó de por vida.

translation.en: -[Beth] I'm never gonna live that down. -No. Never ever.
translation.es: Nunca me dejarás olvidarlo. No. Nunca jamás.

translation.en: Don't give me that look. I was gonna visit more. I just…
translation.es: No me mires así. Quería venir más seguido. Pero... Estuve ocupada.
Quería venir más seguido. Pero... Estuve ocupada.

translation.en: I'm trying to have a life of my own, you know.
Is he there? Can you hear him? Dad?
I gotta go down there, don't I?
Cable guys do it all the time.
translation.es: Los del cable lo hacen siempre.

translation.en: [Haley sighs] I swear to God, Dad.
Only you would come down here in a frickin' hurricane.
translation.es: Solo tú bajarías aquí en medio de un huracán.

translation.en: [radio DJ] Hard and loud. Florida's best hard and heavy music.
translation.es: La mejor estación de música de hard rock y heavy.

translation.en: Hard Rock Radio 98.5. Florida's best hard rock radio.
translation.es: Radio 98.5. La mejor estación de hard rock en Florida.

translation.en: Okay, you're breathing. All right. What's happened? Dad?
Okay. We need to get to a hospital, all right?
translation.es: Bueno. Tenemos que ir a un hospital. Hay que ir ahora mismo.

translation.en: -[flashlight winding] -We need to go right now.
translation.es: Tenemos que ir a un hospital. Hay que ir ahora mismo.

translation.en: [man on radio] Windows for hurricane-force winds -Sunday morning until Sunday evening. -[Sugar continues barking]
translation.es: Se esperan vientos huracanados el domingo desde la mañana hasta la noche.

translation.en: -There's a-- there's a big gator. -Yeah, I know. We've already met.
translation.es: Hay un cocodrilo grande. Lo sé. Ya nos conocimos.

translation.en: through the overflow drainpipe on the lake side. [groans]
translation.es: por el desaguadero que da al lago.

translation.en: Listen to me. Listen to me.
-Not without you. -I don't need your help.
translation.es: - No sin ti. - No necesito que me ayudes.
¿Sugar está...? Sí. Me ayudó a encontrarte.

translation.en: Oh, it's for my Internet dating.
What are you even doing here?
I wanted to board up some vents.
I mean, in this house. I thought you sold the place.
translation.es: Digo, en esta casa. Pensé que la habías vendido.

translation.en: -[groans] -[Haley] Oh, my God! Oh, shit. What happened?
Got tangled up in the pipes when he tried to drag me.
translation.es: Quedé atorado en los caños cuando intentó arrastrarme.

translation.en: [Dave] We're okay on this side of the pipes.
translation.es: Estamos bien de este lado de los caños.

translation.en: -[cell phone buzzing] -[Dave] It's too big to get back here.
translation.es: Es grande, no puede llegar aquí.

translation.en: I've gotta go get my phone.
translation.es: Tengo que ir por mi teléfono.

translation.en: -Nobody is coming in this storm, Haley. -I have to try.
translation.es: No vendrá nadie con esta tormenta, Haley. Tengo que intentarlo.

translation.en: -I'm getting us out of here. -Okay, okay.
translation.es: Haré que salgamos de aquí. Tranquila.

translation.en: Go this way. It's safer. Okay.
You keep your eye on him.
They can't hear you out of the water. They can see you in the dark.
translation.es: No oyen fuera del agua. Pueden verte en la oscuridad.

translation.en: -They're not as fast out of-- -I know, Dad.
translation.es: - Son menos veloces fuera del... - Ya lo sé, papá.

translation.en: -[sighs] Stay here. -[Dave] Well, I thought I'd go for a run.
translation.es: Quédate aquí. Pensaba ir a correr.

translation.en: How's your split in the 100 free?
translation.es: ¿Cómo vas en los cien estilo libre?

translation.en: We already talked about the weather.
Two hundredths, that's nothing. You got that.
translation.es: Dos centésimas no es nada. Mejorarás.

translation.en: You just gotta want it, baby.
If I lose my spot on the travel team, I'd lose my scholarship.
translation.es: Si pierdo mi lugar en el equipo, pierdo la beca.
- Quizá llegué a mi límite. - No.

translation.en: I keep telling you, it's not your body that's holding you back.
translation.es: Te lo he dicho, no es tu cuerpo lo que te detiene.

translation.en: You're not my coach anymore, Dad.

translation.es: Eso de la predadora alfa no me ayuda.

translation.en: [Dave] I'm just saying, you could believe in yourself a little more.
translation.es: Solo digo que podrías creer un poco más en ti.

translation.en: [Dave] Haley, just forget about the team.
Just remember what got you into swimming in the first place.
translation.es: Recuerda por qué empezaste a nadar por primera vez.

translation.en: [Dave] You're gonna blame me 'cause you have a gift.
translation.es: Me culpas porque naciste con un don.

translation.en: [Dave] And I needed to kick you in the butt a little.
You're not gonna give up now.
You don't know anything about me.
You don't sound like you're fine.
[man on radio] The National Weather Service has issued
translation.es: El Servicio Meteorológico advierte que puede haber inundaciones

translation.en: a flash flood warning for all of southern and western Florida.
translation.es: El Servicio Meteorológico advierte que puede haber inundaciones en el sur y el oeste de Florida.
Puede haber graves roturas en los diques.

translation.en: [man on radio] Residents should avoid low-lying areas.
translation.es: Los residentes deben evitar las zonas bajas.

translation.en: I'm gonna go to the front of the house to see if I can call for help.
translation.es: Iré al frente de la casa a ver si puedo pedir ayuda.

translation.en: I hear something moving over near the stairs.
translation.es: Oigo movimiento cerca de la escalera.

translation.en: I think they're still over there.
-[screams] -[man on radio] The wind threat has increased from the previous assessment.
translation.es: La amenaza de vientos se agravó desde la evaluación previa.

translation.en: [gasps] Dad! Dad, I see some people!
-It's heavy. -[man] You got it? Wait, wait, wait, wait.
[man] Whoo! How we gonna open this baby?
Who cares? Think of all the shit we'll get with all this cash.
translation.es: ¿Qué importa? Piensa en lo que vamos a poder comprar.

translation.en: Come on, Stan, time to go!
[woman] Will you go get your brother? We have to leave.
translation.es: Ve por tu hermano. Tenemos que irnos.

translation.en: What the fuck are you doing? Marv!
[Marv] I think there's some people in that house over there.
translation.es: Creo que hay gente en aquella casa.

translation.en: [woman] Marv! Marv, there's nothing there. Let's go. You're gonna get shot.
Stan! Stan, get out of the water! Get out of the water, Stan!
There's another way out. Go over to the other access hatch.
translation.es: Hay otra manera de salir. Ve hasta la otra trampa de acceso.

translation.en: By the entrance to the house.
translation.es: Junto a la entrada de la casa.

translation.en: [Dave] Crawl along the foundation till you reach the wet wall.
translation.es: Arrástrate por los cimientos hasta llegar a la pared húmeda.

translation.en: It's where all the pipes go up into the house.
translation.es: Es donde suben las tuberías a la casa.

translation.en: But be careful. You'll be pretty exposed over there.
translation.es: Pero ten cuidado. Estarás muy expuesta.

translation.en: There's something on top of it.
-Is there a plan B? -That was our plan B.
translation.es: ¿Hay un plan B? Ese era el plan B.

translation.en: In less than an hour, this crawl space will be under water.
translation.es: En menos de una hora, todo esto estará bajo el agua.

translation.en: No. They came in from there.
Come back to this side of the pipes. We'll figure something out.
translation.es: Regresa a este lado de los caños. Algo se nos ocurrirá.

translation.en: Stay with the boat. I'll be right back.
translation.es: Quédate en el bote. Vuelvo enseguida.

translation.en: -Stop! -[Wayne] Haley! -[Haley] Wait, don't come down! -[Dave screams]
[Dave] Wait! There's two gators down here!
[Wayne] Okay, hold on. Don't move. Hold on!
-Pete, you copy? Pete, do you copy? -[chains rattling]
Pete, goddammit, man. Where are you?
I need you down here now with a snare pole!
translation.es: ¡Necesito que me traigas un lazo para cocodrilos!

translation.en: -It's okay. They can't get in here. -[Haley groans]
[Haley] I never thought it would end like this.
We should never have come back here.
[Dave] Haley, you stay strong. We're getting out of here.
translation.es: Haley, sé valiente. Saldremos de aquí.

translation.en: You remember when you were little…
-[coughs] -…and Beth could hold her breath for the length of the pool and you couldn't?
translation.es: y Beth atravesaba la piscina sin tomar aire, y tú no?

translation.en: I'm not really up for memory lane right now, Dad.
translation.es: No quiero ponerme nostálgica ahora, papá.

translation.en: Yeah, well, you got so mad and you stormed off.
-Yeah, I was a little jerk. -Yeah, well, Haley, that night…
translation.es: Sí. Era una pequeña idiota. Sí, bueno, esa noche...

translation.en: I woke up about 2:00 in the morning 'cause I heard something outside.
translation.es: desperté a las 2:00 a. m. Escuché algo afuera.

translation.en: I thought it was a burglar, so I snuck down,
translation.es: Creí que era un ladrón, por eso bajé

translation.en: and I saw you in the pool, taking your giant breaths again and again.
translation.es: y te vi en la piscina tomando grandes bocanadas de aire una y otra vez.

translation.en: You figured that shit out all by yourself.
And that's when I knew, this kid's a fighter.
translation.es: Fue cuando me di cuenta. "Esta niña es una luchadora".

translation.en: So we may be stubborn, but we do not give up.
translation.es: Puede que seamos tercos, pero jamás nos rendimos.

translation.en: Mom was not happy, and I was selfish…
translation.es: Mamá no era feliz, y yo era egoísta.

translation.en: and I didn't pay enough attention to her.
Yes, because you were always with me.
Every weekend at the meets. On the road away from home.
translation.es: En competencias los fines de semana. O viajando lejos de casa.

translation.en: It had nothing to do with you. Is that what you think?
translation.es: No tuvo nada que ver contigo. ¿Eso piensas?

translation.en: It was you and Beth that kept us together.
translation.es: Tú y Beth nos mantuvieron juntos.

translation.en: When you girls left, we were just…
two lonely people in a big, empty house.
translation.es: dos personas solitarias en una casa grande y vacía.

translation.en: Your mom got a second chance, Haley, and she deserves to be happy.
translation.es: Tu mamá tuvo una segunda oportunidad y merece ser feliz.

translation.en: I don't think I deserve one.
I miss seeing your face in the stands when I win.
translation.es: Extraño ver tu cara en las gradas cuando gano.

translation.en: -I thought you were mad at me. -I am!
translation.es: - Creí que estabas enojada conmigo. - ¡Lo estoy!

translation.en: We are gonna beat these pea-brained lizard shits.
They didn't like it when I was banging on the pipes.
translation.es: No les gustó cuando golpeé las tuberías.

translation.en: I think I can distract them if you can dive
translation.es: Puedo distraerlos si te sumerges hasta llegar a la escalera.

translation.en: all the way under until you get to the stairs.
translation.es: si te sumerges hasta llegar a la escalera.

translation.en: -I'm coming back for you, okay? -You better.
translation.es: Volveré por ti. Más te vale.

translation.en: [Haley] Dad? I can't make it to the stairs.
translation.es: ¿Papá? No puedo llegar a la escalera.

translation.en: I'm going for the drainpipe, okay?
Come on! Four, five, six. Don't quit on me, Daddy, come on!
-Hey, Sugar. Okay, Sugar. It's okay. -[Sugar whimpers]
-[groans] -Come on. Let's get to the car.
[Haley] No, there are too many of 'em. We need to stay here.
No, those levees are gonna break, and when they do we can't be here.
translation.es: Los diques se romperán. No podemos quedarnos aquí.

translation.en: That boat's our only chance to leave.
translation.es: Ese bote es nuestra única posibilidad.

translation.en: I think we can make it.
They gather in the floodwaters 'cause it's easier to hunt.
translation.es: Se juntan en estas aguas porque les resulta más fácil cazar.
Si no salpicamos, no nos cazan.

translation.en: I think the rain should cover us.

translation.es: Es el ojo de la tormenta.

translation.en: You got this! You're faster than they are!
You gotta be fucking kidding me.
Hello? Hello. Can anybody hear me?
I'm trapped with my father in our house in Coral Lake.
translation.es: ¡Estoy atrapada con mi papá en nuestra casa de Coral Lake!

translation.en: Come on, you son of a bitch!
Come on, we gotta get to the roof. Come on.
translation.es: Ven, hay que llegar al techo. ¡Rápido!

translation.en: Keep the pressure on your arm.
translation.es: Mantén la presión en el brazo.

translation.en: -The house made it after all. -Yeah, she's a strong one. Come on.
translation.es: - La casa resistió, después de todo. - Sí, es fuerte. Vamos.

translation.en: [Dave] I lied to you about the deal.
translation.es: Es mentira que se canceló el trato.

translation.en: I just couldn't sign the papers.
-'Cause I don't want to sell. -[Haley] It doesn't matter, Dad.
translation.es: - No quiero venderla. - No importa, papá.

translation.en: -It's just a house. -[Dave] It's not just a house. It's our home.
translation.es: - Es solo una casa. - No es solo una casa. Es nuestro hogar.

translation.en: -The last place we were a family. -[Haley] This house isn't our home.
translation.es: El último sitio donde fuimos familia. Esta casa no es nuestro hogar.
Tú y yo... ese es el hogar.

translation.en: -It's the rescue helicopter. -All right, go. Hurry!
